title: Which K-pop idols are close to Yoo Jaesuk? - Quora

response.answer_text: EXO (most close is Sehun, he is in a variety show with him, called BUSTED)  Sejeong (I.O.I/Gugudan) [variety show with him, same as Sehun]  Rain and Hyori  Jessi ( come on jessi!)  Mijoo (LOVELYZ) [in variety show with him called The Sixth Sense
